titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab:
1807, Jan. 1. Th. Richard IV, 1 page. E Fks, S & A Nicholson, Mulreadys, Binham, M Dawe & G M C dine; adv. Dawe & Hazlit ; invités three Taylors, Wilkie & Hayward, & G Wilcocke
.
2. F. Letter from Philips . Curran & Hutchins call{:} theatre, Know your own Mind.

3. Sa. Call on Curran
n &
Northcote ; adv. Humphries
: meet Bosville (& Burdet ): G M C dines. meet Macarthy .

Jan. 4. Su. Dine at King’s , w. mrs & miss Sturt, Danvers’s, Best, Plowden & Williams; adv. May & Fyfield
.
5. M. Wild Irish Girl, Vol. I.

6. Tu. Wild Irish Girl, Vol. II. Call on
Curran
(adv. Bennet & Heywood) &, w. him, on Kemble
n [Holland]:
theatre, w. M J, Douglas .

7. W. Wild Irish Girl, Vol. III, p. 100. Call on Jo G
: Moody & Binham call: G M C sups.

8. Th. Wild Irish Girl, fin. Call on Wolcot
: Toppgs tea & supper.
9. F. Chances, acts 1, 2, 3/2. Hazlit calls.

10. Sa. Letters, Lauderdale , Philips, &c . Chances, fin. Call on Curran
: dine at King’s , w. Wolcot, Sturts, Danverses, Best & Williams .
Jan. 11. Su. Write to Lauderdale . Jo G at tea.

12. M. Nice Valour, act 1. Curran, Wolcot, Bennet & G M C dine. Call on Lamb
. Curran sleeps.

13. Tu.
Curran breakfasts: call on Johnson
&
Jo G
: G M C sups. Note from Lauderdale .

14. W. Piccolomini, act 1. Call on Johnson
&
A C Hall
: Wroughton calls n : Sarah Taylor & 3 Colnets dine: theatre, False Alarms, act 2. Meet Este & Tuffin : Sa T sleeps.

15. Th. Call on Davison
n ,
M Lamb
&
Curran ; adv. Hutchins
. Write to Wroughton .

16. F. Call on Davison
,
M Lamb
&
Britton
: theatre, False Alarms. 5 Taylors invités á diner.

17. Sa. Letter to Philips . Call on Wordsworth
& //
Taylors ; adv. Martineau : sup at Hazlit’s , w. Lambs, H Robinson, Northcote, Dyer, J Hazlit & L Martin .
Jan. 18. Su. Piccolomini, act 2. Dine at King’s , w. 2 Sturts, Danvers’s, Wolcot, Williams & Fyfield : T T & N G call n .
19. M. Letter to L White . Binham, Free & T T at tea.

20. Tu. Write to L White & Everina (18.16.5) . Call on R Taylor
,
North
&
Jo G (adv. W G ): dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Durham & Knowles . meet Wroughton & Lawrence .
21. W. Write to Philips . Sup at Nicholson’s , w. Combe & M J .

22. Th. Wallestein, fin. G M C dines; adv. T T
.

23. F. Call on Philips
&
Lamb
: sup at Lamb’s , w. Clarkson, Hazlit & M J .

24. Sa. Write to Philips . T T calls. Theatre; adv. Hill
.
Jan. 25. Su. Walk to Wimbledon, 6 miles in 90 minutes: dine at H Tooke’s , w. Burdet, & Paul & P Courtenay : meet Britton & Beresfords .

27. Tu.
Jo G & son, N G, G M C & T T dine. Carthusian Friar. Symond’s Inn, w. Springsguth .

28. W. Breakfast at Lauderdale’s , w. Maitland & Stevenson : call on M Lamb
,
Johnson
&
Jo G
:
theatre, w. M J, F & 2 S Beresfords, Assignatn . Bligh’s Voyage, çala.

29. Th. Call on Davison
, &
Sloper
&
Allen
: S Topping at tea.

30. F. Call on Johnson (adv. Macmillan ), &
Wroughton
n : T T sups. New Inn, act 1.

31. Sa. New Inn, act 2. Call on Philips
,
Wordsworth
&
Hazlit
: Wroughton n & Hawthorns na call: Symond’s Inn, w. Springsguth .

Feb. 1. Su.
Flather junr
calls n : call on Wroughton
: Topping & Smith sup.

2. M. Call on Philips
.

3. Tu.
Westminster Hall (w. Hayward) & Serjt’s Inn for Nicholson : call on Macarthy
n : meet C Moore , C Smith & Harwood : dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Parr of Ex. & maj. Moore .
4. W. Hudibras, C. I. Write to Wroughton . Dine at Hawthorn’s , w. M J, Mackoy, & another; adv. Plunket ; invités Ruthven .

5. Th. Hudibras, C. II. Call on Jo G
: meet Dawe : G M C dines.
6. F. Hudibras, C. III. Hazlit, Dawe, Furner, Flathers & W G sup.

7. Sa. Hudibras, C. III, fin. Theatre, New Way to pay Old Debts:
J Hazlit calls. Write to Wroughton .
Feb. 8. Su. Accounts.

9. M. Ecole des Femmes, acte 1. Call on
Nicholson , for M J
:
theatre, w. do , False Alarms & Emily .

10. Tu. T W Malkin, 172 pp. Call on Davison
,
Johnson
&
Philips
.
11. W. Jonson’s Masks, p. 54.

12. Th. Jonson’s Masks, p. 98.
Hazlit calls.

13. F. Masks, p. 199.
Carlisles call: T T sups.

14. Sa. Sad Shepherd. Call on Wolcot
.
Feb. 15. Su. Masques, p. 256.
16. M. Masques, p. 323. Hawthorns call.

17. Tu. Masques, p. 367. Call on Davison
,
Jo G
,
Johnson
, &
Lamb for M J
: (w. do , meet A Opie ) theatre, Jealous Wife: T T sups.
18. W. England, 2 pp. Masques, p. 418. Sup at Topping’s , w. M J .

19. Th. Masques, p. 446. Call on Davison
n ,
M Lamb
&
Philips ; adv. Raymond
:
theatre, w. M J & Topping, Curfew .

20. F. Masques, p. 463. Call on Davison
n ,
M Lb
&
Philips ; adv. Ring & Hoare
: sup at Lambs ; adv. M Burney
.

21. Sa. Edward II, acts 1, 2, 3. Call on
M Lamb
&
Johnson
.

Feb. 22. Su. Call on Wroughton
: Lofft dines; adv. Topping & Smith
. Jas Flather calls: Lofft sleeps.
Duckworth at Constantinople .

23. M. Edward II, fin: Mustapha, act 1. Call on Dawe
.

24. Tu. Call on Sloper
& Serjt’s Inn ,
R Taylor
&
Johnson
: T T tea & supper.

25. W. Mustapha, act 2. Lofft & T T dine: sup, w. do , at Topping’s
: Lofft sleeps.

26. Th. Mustapha, act 3. Lofft breakfasts, talk of Xt & Mahomet
.
27. F. Mustapha, act 4. T T at tea.

28. Sa. Write to Everina . Mustapha, act 5: Gorboduc, act 1. Call on Lauderdale
n &
Northcote
: meet Lawrence .

Mar. 1. Su. Accounts. Dine at King’s , w. Butlers, Mays, Supple, Italian Jew & mrs Hippisley; adv. Plunkets
. Jns Flather calls. Gorboduc, act 2.

2. M. Gorboduc, fin. C Smith, L Smith & Newhse dine:
theatre, w. do , M J & E C & 4, Curfew & Weathercock .

3. Tu.
T T & Hazlit call: Evening mrs Hippisley’s , w. King, L Lanesborough, Plunkets, Rossewens, May & Wolsey .

4. W. Call on Wilkie
.

5. Th. Hieronymo, acts 1 & 2. Call on
Hazlit , w. M J .

6. F. Letter to Curran . Plunkets call: call on S Nicholson , for M J
: G M C dines.

7. Sa. Call on Lauderdale
(adv. sir H Moncrieff) ,
Jo G
n &
Johnson
. Write to Curran .

Mar. 8. Su. Accounts. Call on Graham , w. Wroughton : dine at Plunket’s , w. King, L Lk , Danvers’s, mrs Plunket & son, mrs Hippisley, Dolland, May & { }adv. Macarthy
.
9. M. England, revise. Hazlit calls: E Topping sups.

10. Tu. Hieronymo, act 3. Call on Mrs Jo G , for M J
: theatre, Town & Country; adv. Skeffington
.

11. W. Call on Nicholson
: Hazlit calls n .
12. Th. Hieronymo, fin: Campaspe, acts 1, 2.

13. F.
G M C’s , w. M J; adv. G Wilcocke
.

14. Sa.
T T calls: Hazlit sups.
Mar. 15. Su. New Inn, act 3: L Knapp , C Smith , mrs Dorset & W L White n call: call on Keir , w. M J n .

16. M. New Inn, fin: Search, pp. 83.
J J G calls.

17. Tu. Every Man out of his Humour, acts 1 & 2. Call on Jo G
: dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle & capt. Hunter .

18. W. Call on R Taylor
&
H Rogers
.

19. Th.
Tobin & Hazlit call: call on Goodbehere
,
Philips
(adv. Thelwal, Wilson & Raymond) ,
R Taylor
, &
Nicholson , for M J ; adv. Preston
.

20. F. Letter to Johnson . Mrs Cec. Smith at tea: Hazlit calls: call on Joyce , for M J ; adv. Jervis
: Dawe sups.
21. Sa. Write to Johnson .
Mar. 22. Su. Stock. W L White & Grattan call n , & Jo G n .
23. M. England, 1/2 page. Dine at Johnson’s , Purser’s Cross, w. Richards .
24. Tu. Call on Jo G : stock.

25. W. Accounts.
Portland Administration
26. Th. England, revise. T T & Hazlit call: call on Toppings , w. M J .
27. F. Milton (Todd), çala.

28. Sa.
Skinner Street, w. M J : call on Lamb, d[o] : T T & G M C dine; adv. Mulready & Dawe ; invité G Wilcocke
.

Mar. 29. Su. Call on Joyce , for M J ; adv. Towers & Rennel
.

30. M. Paradise Regd B. I. G Wilcocke calls: call on miss Smith , for M J ; adv. mrs Dorset
: Dawe sups.
31. Tu. Milton, çala. Sup at Topping’s , w. M J & T T : Mulready calls n .

Apr. 1. W. Call on Skinner Street ,
Johnson
,
Philips
(adv. Lancaster, Munday, Cobb & R Taylor) ,
Wolcot
&
Hippisley ; adv. Macarthy
; theatre, Wood Dæmon: Dawe sups.
2. Th. Write to Curran & H.lGodwin . Lambs dine.

3. F.
M Lamb calls: call on Jo G
n ,
T T
&
Taylor
4. Sa. Write to Everina . Hazlit calls.
Apr. 5. Su. Gismunda. Meet Pratt : Binham at tea: T T sups.

6. M. Call on Grattan
n : theatre, 1/2 Richard, & Mother Goose. Doctrine of Divorce, p. 11.

7. Tu.
Dawe , Mulready & M Lamb call: call on Jo G , w. T T : dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Lindsay, A & C Aikin, & Gregory junr
: Nicholson calls n .

8. W. Write to Perry & Philips, on Nicholson
. Call on Sloper
: Toppings au soir.

9. Th. Spenser, çala. R, A & Susan Taylor dine; adv. G Wilcocke
. Dawe calls: call on
Dawe
.
Opie dies.

10. F.
Theatre, Day in London. Binham calls.

11. Sa.
M calls, for Adkins
: T T, from Macmillan
: call on Wolcot , w. M J : theatre, Whistle for It.
Apr. 12. M. Su. Write to Johnson & Philips . Tobin & Jo G call: N G at tea.
13. M. Call on Keir , w. M J : Toppings au soir.

14. Tu. Spenser, çala. T T dines: call on
Taylor , w. do ; adv. Susan
: Keir, Mulready & T T sup.

15. W.
Westminster Hall, w. Hayward : call on Northcote
n &
Nicholson
.

16. Th. England, 2 pp. Call on Philips
n ,
M Lamb
,
Hazlit
, &
Taylor ; adv. Susan
/
Anderson £20 .

17. F. Paradise Regd, B. III, IV. Call on Philips ; adv. Cooper, Murray & Constable
.
18. Sa. Literary History, çala. Grattan calls.

Apr. 19. Su. Call on W Wordsworth
n : J J G calls. G M C dines; adv. Hazlit
.

20. M.
Serjeant’s Inn, for Nicholson
: T T sups.
21. Tu. Erasmus, &c.
22. W. Literary History, çala. G M C sups.

23. Th. Letter to Holland, 2 pages. Call, w. M J , on Skinner Street (adv. T T) , &
Jo G
: T T dines; adv. G M C
.

24. F. Call on Lamb (w. M J),
Nicholson
(adv. Hayward) , &
Sloper ; adv. Sutton
.

25. Sa.
Westminster-Hall, w. Hayward : call on Carlisle
&
Jacob
n : meet Perry :
theatre, w. M J, Iron Chest .

27. M. Caleb Williams, Vol. I. T T, G M C & Clara Smith dine; adv. M Dawe, Toppings & E Hill
. Write to Lofft .

28. Tu. Call on Jacob
, &, for M J , on Nicholson
: T T sups.

29. W. Letter from Curran : write to Johnson . Hazlit at tea: Coleridge, Wordsworth & T T sup.
Dissolution

30. Th. P S to Johnson, Purser’s Cross . Theatre, 1/2 Mcbeth:
Fenwick calls.

May 1. F. Spenser’s Ireland, p. 60. Hartley Coleridge, journée; adv. Hazlit, reads
.

2. Sa. Breakfast at Coleridge’s , w. Pasley; adv. Hayward
: call, w. do , on Nicholson (Berwick Str) &
Heath
: call on Johnson
:
theatre, w. M J, Adelgitha .
May 3. Su. Letter to Holland, p. 3, 4, 5, 6. Binham sups.

4. M. Write to Holland . Exhibition; adv. Perry, J C Banks, Batty, Hayward, Dawe & Annis
: Serjeants’ Inn; adv. Nicholson
.

5. Tu. Call on Coleridge
, Nicholson (Fleet) &
Jo G
: T T sups.

6. W. Shakespear, Sonnets, 1-20. Letter from Holland : call on Johnson
, &
Scott
&
Polhill
, &
T T
, &
Topping
: G M C dines & sups. meet Sloper . Binham calls, matin , & W Stewart n .

7 Th.
S Sw. M J : dine at Philips’s , w. Salvo, Fraser, mrs Mavor & Surrs; adv. Keys

8. F.
S S w. M J : call on Jo G
.

9. Sa.
S S w. M J; adv. T T
. Winter in London, p. 77. Fenwick calls n .
May 10. Su. Surr, p. 118.
11. M. Surr, p. 200. S S w. M J .

12. Tu. Tooke v. Paul, pp. 22. S S w. T T : dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Sturch & Knowles : call on Taylor
.
13. W. Letter from Holland . S S w. T T M J . Surr, p. 272.

14. Th.
S S; adv. M J & T T
: T T dines.

15. F.
S S w. M J : G M C sups.

16. Sa.
S S w. M J : Hazlit calls.

May 17. Su.
S S w. T T : call on Nicholson , K B P: G M C dines.
18. M. Letter to Holland . Surr, Vol. II, p. 201. Knight (Camden Town) & Stewart call. S S opens.
19. Tu. Write to Holland . Surr, p. 276; Vol. III, p. 102. Meet Lambs .
20. W. Surr, p. 264, fin.

21. Tu. Call on S Nicholson
n &
Northcote
. Sinbad, çala.

22. F. Call on Binney
,
S Nicholson
,
Stephens
,
Edwards engr
&
Nicholson
: T T calls.

23. Sa. Call on Binney
, &
Stephens
, & w. Stephens, on Crutchley
&
Fry
: dine at M Jones’s , w. R Jones, M J, F, M & C .

May 24. Su.
H Rowan & mrs Beresford call n : explanation, S S, on Belcher & Bovy : T T dines; adv. N G
25. M. Sup at Lamb’s , w. miss Stodart .

26. Tu. Call on Crawford (Seymour Street) ,
Davison
,
M Lamb
&
Jo G
: meet R Taylor : dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, major Moore & H Rowan; adv. S Beresford
.

27. W. Call on Crutchley
n ,
Lamb
,
Johnson
&
T T
: W Nicholson calls: call on
Sloper
n : meet G Dyer .
28. Th. C Williams, Vol. II. Altercation, S S . Brackenbury calls na .

29. F. Faux Dauphin, 2 Vs. H Rowan, major Plunket, M Hawthorn, mrs Beresford & son, F Rowan & T T dine; invités Brackenburys & mrs Plunket ; adv. John Nicholson
.

30. Sa. Write to Holland . Call on Sloper
n . Toppings call.
May 31. Su. C Williams, Vol. III: Raynal sur l’Indostan, pp. 30.

June 1. M.
G Wilcocke & G M C sup.

2. Tu. Shakespear, Sonnets, 66. Call on Heath
, & w. T T, on Nicholson
: meet Sloper & Keir .
3. W. Shakespear, Sonnets, 126. Write to Thos Cooper & Springsguth . Hazlit sups.

4. Th. Tooke v. Paul, Pt II, pp. 37. Call on
Hayward
n : G M C, G Wilcocke, 3 Stephensons & Jno Turner dine.

5. F. Shakespear, Sonnets, 154, & P Pilgrim. Call on capt. Binney (deaf)
&
Jo G
n : meet G Wilcocke .

6. Sa. Venus & Adonis. Write to Wroughton . Call on Hayward
&
Nicholson
n .

June 7. Su.
S S w. M J : meet Langhorn . Donne, çala.

8. M. Call on Jo G
: T T sups.

9. Tu. Daniel, çala: Jonathas. Call on Nicholson
: W N calls: dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Whiteside; adv. H Edgworth
.
10. W. Daniel, çala: Lover’s Complaint. Call on Toppings , w. M J : Binham calls.
11. Th. Daniel, Rosamond. S S w. T T, H. absent : G M C sups.

12. F.
S S early: meet Lamb : Water-colours Exhibition; adv. J Taylor
: E Fks dine: subpoena.

13. Sa. Call on Wolcot
,
Wood
,
R Twiss
,
M
&
L K
: meet Miller, w. M J : T T sups; adv. M.

June 14. Su. Coach to Wimbledon, w. Le Maitre : call on H Tooke
na; adv. Bosville, &c
: chaise w. mrs Reid . Battle of Friedland .

15. M.
S S w. M J & 4; dine; H. absents himself
: call on Wood, at
Wolcot’s
: M calls. Call on
Hardy
&
Le Maitre
.

16. Tu. Call on T T
&
Wood
: dine at S S: T T at tea: meet Hazlit .

17. W. Call on Wordsworth
,
H Rogers
&
Jo G
n : mrs Topping , & Knight, junr call: explanation, S S; adv. T T from Earle
.

18. Th. Write to John Taylor . He calls, S S : call on Lamb
: G M C sups. W Nicholson & Dawe n call.

19. F. Burdet, pp. 5. Write to Hooley . Call on Wood
n : meet Combe .

20. Sa.
Hooley calls: call on Wood
:
T T tea & sup; adv. E Fks
. meet Tooke . Write to H Tooke .

June 21. Su.
Hooley calls: meet Thelwal : L K at tea: M calls.

22. M. Call on Davison
,
Hazlit
& Wood
Wolcot
: G M C sups. Armistice: Parliament meets.

23. Tu. Call on Johnson
n; adv. Churchil, G & J Robinson
: tea Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle & Hewlet .

24. W. Call on Johnson
, &, w. M J, on M Lamb
: call on Hazlit
: sup at Lamb’s , w. 3 J Lambs, 4 Burneys, 3 Martins, 2 Fks, Rickman, Philips, & mrs Reynolds .

25. Th. Malone, çala. Sup at Lamb’s , w. M J & Hazlit : call, w. M J, on
M Jones
.

26. F. Letter from H Tooke . W Stuart calls; adv. Toppings
: G M C & T T sup: consultation at Parke’s ; adv. Wood & M
: Tuthill calls n .

27. Sa.
Westminster-Hall, Knight v. Wolcot; adv. T T & Dawe
: call on Wolcot ; adv. Philips, H Ellis & Penwarne
. Letter from J Taylor .

June 28. Su. Meet John Flather, w. M J : dine at Philips’s, Hampstead , w. Wolcot, Pratt, Bingley, Drew & Surrs; adv. Elringtons
: Wroughton n & J J G na call.

29. M. Call on R Taylor
: dine at M Jones’s , w. M J, F, M, J, W, & miss Colnet (chairing sir F. Bt .); adv. Dibbins
: tea at E Fks , w. M J : Hazlit calls.

30. Tu. Hazlit, çala. Call on Wroughton
n &
Jo G
.

July 1. W.
Wroughton calls n : call on Johnson
n : M Jones dines: Dawe & T T sup.

2. Th. Call on Johnson
: G M C at Skinner Street : call on R Taylor
.
3. F. Read Camilla to M J & T T . Meet H Scott & C Moore : Hazlit calls na .

4. Sa. Camilla, revise. W Stuart calls: call on
Jo G
.

July 5. Su.
S S w. T T : T T dines; adv. Toppings
.

6. M.
Mrs Napier dines; adv. T T (Shepherd of Liverpool, & N G) : theatre, Hamlet, acts 2, 3.

7. Tu. Accompany T T, to Withers, Butterworth, Rickman, Oliver, Setcole & Clark : call, w. him, on
E Fk ; adv. T Fk & Lamb
: Keir, Hazlit & T T sup. meet N & Jo G . Defeat of Buenos Ayres

8. W. Call, w. T T, on Taylor
&
Nicholson
: T T dines; adv. G M C
: call on Joyce , w. M J & T T . Peace of Tilsit, France & Russia .

9. Th. Call on Taylor
&
Johnson
&
C Mountcashel
. Crompton calls n : T T dines. Ditto, France & Prussia .

10. F. Call on Taylor
,
Johnson
&
Nicholson ; adv. Bonnycastle
: T T sups.

11. Sa. Paper for Symonds, 6 pp: Meet Symds
& Rickman, at Taylor’s
: Jervis calls.
July 12. Su. Write to Symonds .

13. M. Write to W R, Bristol
, & Everina : Letter from Symonds .

14. Tu. Meet Oliver, at Taylor’s
: call on Jo G
&
Withers
n : T T sups.

15. W. Call on Philips (adv. Quin ),
Taylor
, &
Williams, Nt Mt
: dine Blue Posts: Carlisles call n .

16. Th. Call on T T
,
Taylor
&
Hooley
n : T T & G M C dine: meet Hazlit & Dawe : Grattan calls n .

17. F. Call on Taylor
: write to Butterworth : call on Johnson
n .

18. Sa. Letter from Butterworth : write to do
. T T sups: Lamb calls.

July 19. Su. Accounts. T T on Lamb
:
Toppings call.

20. M. Meet Oliver, at Taylor’s
: call on Jo G
: Lb, Hazlit & T T sup.
21. Tu. Write to Everina : £30 from Johnson : H absent till F.

22. W. Write to Daniel Stuart . Dine at Lamb’s
: C Mountcashel calls, 10 o’c to 1.
23. Th. Write to Whitbread . C Mountcashel at tea: E Fks sup: Hazlit calls.

24. F. Call on Hazlit ; adv. Lamb & M Burney
: sup at E Fk’s , w. M J .

25. Sa. Call on Philips ; adv. Thelwal
: meet Hazlit : G M C sups.
July 26. Su. Accounts. Après diner, C Mountcashel, £200.

27. M.
C Mountcashel at tea; adv. T T
: meet Wroughton .
28. Tu. Seek Tuthil & Grattan : dine at Johnson’s , w. Laing bookseller, Scott & Wilkie .

29. W. Letter from L White . Call on Johnson
&
Jo G
: Taylor, Hazlit, T T & G M C sup. £200: write to L W .

30. Th. Literary History, p. 1. Call on Lamb ; adv. Hazlit
: T T sups; adv. G M C
.
31. F. Lit. History, p. 1, 2, 3. Lamb & Hazlit sup. H. absent.
Aug. 1. Sa. Hazlit to Malthus, p. 118.
Aug. 2. Su. Accounts. Seek Wroughton : T T dines: John Flather calls n .
3. M. Hazlit, p. 234. T T sups.
4. Tu. Lit. History, p. 4. Hazlit, p. 378, fin. Write to Hazlit . Dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle & son, James Hall, Keene, & partner to Constable .

5. W. Call on H Rogers
&
Jo G
: Hazlit calls n . H. absent, 2 days.

6. Th. Letter from Hazlit . Call on Taylor (Vaughan): T T dines; adv. G M C
: Grattan calls n .
7. F. Write to Hazlit . Lock at S S ; adv. T T & Barret, constable, 3 Hodgkinses : T T sleeps: Hooley sleeps 4 nights in S S .
8. Sa. Padlocks: Mansion-house, Hatton Garden, Bow Street, & Hobler, w. T T : M, T T, M J, E C, F & C dine at S S : Jo. Hodgkins in possession.

Aug. 9. Su.
S S, w. M & T T : T T dines: call on
Mulready , w. M J & T T .

10. M.
Hodgkins breakfasts, S S : M dines, Nott’s: call, w. him, on Cotton
,
Lepard
&
Troby
: Cobb sends: Bow Street, w. T T, see Miller
: M & T T wait till three: T T sleeps.

11. Tu. Call on Thomas
,
S T
,
Cruickshank
&
Corbet , w. T T : Bow Street, w. Corbet &
T T, warrant : Jo. H. calls: Adkins calls: M & T T dine: H & Adkins call: Bow-Street, w. T T, M, H, Jo H & Humphrys; adv. Clifford
: call on Knapp; barrister , w. T T : sleep at S S.

12. W. Call on Symonds n
,
Wilson (printer)
Foulkes n
,
Lepard
, & (w. him) Barber
: Bow-Street, Lepd , Humphrys, Hs , Corbet{,} M & T T : call on Johnson
: meet Malthus , Henley & Hazlit : T T dines: Vaughan at S S . Edw. Wt dies.

13. Th. Call on Humphrys ; adv. T H, Jo H, M & T T
: su
T T sups.

14. F.
Hazlit calls: call, w. M J, on Jo G n
&
Lamb n
. Prorogation
15. Sa. Sup at E Fk’s , w. M J .
Aug. 16. Su. Stock: Somers Town : Toppings call: G M C sups. Hodgkinses call.

17. M.
Call twice on Foulkes
&
Humphrys
. Everina at S T n .

18. Tu.
Lepard & Hodgkins call: dine at
Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Mullet & Hommey; adv. Stephens
.

19. W.
M & Humphrys call: call on
Johnson
: Everina & Ed. Wt call at S T n : Lamb & G M C sup.

20. Th. Call on Longdil
: M calls. Paul, pp. 219.

21. F.
Harvey, &c, call n : tea S T, w. M J & G M C : call on Longdil
.
22. Sa. Woodland, Vol. 1 & 4. Call on Carlisle nit : Darton calls n : Tuthill calls n . Write to Johnson .

Aug. 23. Su.
E Fks dine; adv. Ed. Wt, L K & mrs Mulready
.
24. M. Letter from Johnson . Call on do & Longdil : meet J Taylor . Woodland, Vol. III.

25. Tu. Call on Humphrys , w. Longdil; adv. Hodgkins
; & on
Nicholson
,
Longdil
,
Lepard (w. M), &
E Fk ; for M J ; adv. Braddock junr
. Woodland, Vol. II.

26. W.
Harris sends: send to M : call on Johnson
: E Fk at tea; adv. T T
. 100 Fabs, &c.

27. Th.
M calls: Siboya, w. T T : call on Longdil , w. do
.

28. F. Wait for Hodgkins, w. M & T T : call on Longdil
: Lambeth, w. M J & T T .

29. Sa. Call on R Taylor
(adv. pere ainé) &
Lamb ; adv. M Lamb
.

Aug. 30. Su.
E Fks & T T dine; adv. C Colnet
.

31. M.
Hodgkins calls: call on Everina
.

Sep. 1. Tu. Goldsmith, An. Nature, p. 68. T T at tea: call on
Longdil n
.

2. W. Goldsmith, p. 98. Call on Johnson
,
Davison
,
Peele’s
,
Longdil
n &
Jo G
: M Lamb calls: T T sups. Write to Everina .
3. Th. Call on Humphrys twice, w. Longdil & T T : boat, w. M J, T T, E C, C, J & W . Fanny & Mary dine w. Everina , Southampton Row .

4. F.
Longdil & Hodgkins call: call on Jo G , w. M J : E Fks & T T sup; Barth. Fair . Seneca, cap. 1-10.

5. Sa. Seneca, cap. 15: Goldsmith, p. 120. Call on Longdil
:
Barth. Fair, w. T T
.

Sep. 6. Su. Seneca, cap. 17. T T dines; adv. G M C
. Carlisles , Buchan & John Flather call.
7. M. Seneca, Prov. cap. 1 & 2: Colin Clout. Call on Scott , cpp: sup at Lamb’s , w. M J & Tuthill . Surrender of Copenhagen

8. Tu.
Greenwich, w. E Fks, T T, M J, E C, & 5 children : Longdil calls n .
9. W. Spencer, Hymns. Seek Hepburn & Perks : T T sups.

10. Th. Call on H Rogers
: Hazlit at tea.

11. F. Seneca, cap. 4. Call on Longdil
&
Scott
: dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Sturch & Gooch .

12. Sa. Seneca, De Constantia, cap. 5. Call on
Nicholson
: T T sups.

Sep. 13. Su. Seneca, c. 9. Accounts. Call on Toppings
: N G & G M C at tea.

14. M. Seneca, c. 19. Call on Taylor
&
Nicholson
: M Lamb calls:
Tuthil tea & supper .

15. Tu.
Longdil calls: call on Philips
&
Jo G
: tea Lamb’s , w. Hazlit .

16. W. Just Italian: Davenant, çala. Call on Nicholson
. Ed. Wollstonecraft in Primrose Street .

17. Th.
Fargues calls: call on
Longdil
&
T T
: M calls:
theatre, w. M J, Country Girl .

18. F. Seneca, De Brevitate, c. 4: Gondibert, C. I, II. Call on Mulready
n : tea & supper, Tuthil’s , w. M J
.
19. Sa. Crispianus. Garrets opened: T T dines. Aug 12

Sep. 20. Su. Accounts. Call on Wroughton
: T T & G M C dine; adv. Jo & N G
. Mulready calls.

21. M. Call, w. M J, on mrs Hawthorn
; &
Flaxman
n : sup at Lamb’s
.
22. Tu. Lamb’s Ulysses, p. 124: Gondibert, C. III, IV. Mulready calls, & Hazlit .

23. W. Wits, act 1 & 2. Call on Gibbs
&
R Taylor
.

24. Th. Wits, act 3, 4, 5: Seneca, c. 8. Call on Longdil
,
Curran
nit , &
E Fks , for M J ; adv. F Ht
: T T sups: M calls.

25. F. Call on C Mountcashel
, &
Longdil on arrest : Lambs sup.

26. Sa.
R, E & A Taylors breakfast: meet Longdil : T T dines: theatre, Love for Love, act 4: E Fks sup.

Sep. 27. Su.
Curran n & Toppings call.

28. M.
Curran breakfasts: call, w. him, on North
,
O Brien
, &
Mountcashel
: meet, do
, Perry : theatre, 1/10 Cymbeline.

29. Tu. Call on Davison
&
Lamb
: Curran dines.

30. W.
Catalogue, w. M J : Longdil calls: E Fks sup.

Oct. 1. Th.
C Mountcashel calls: call on mrs Gill , w. T T : G M C dines.

2. F.
C Mountcashel , M Lamb & T T call: E T en bas : call on Curran
, &, w. him, on Hutchins
: dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli & Bonnycastle .

3. Sa. Call on Taylor
: T T & Mulready sup. Catalogue, w. M J .

Oct. 4. Su. Chaise, w. Currans, to Dulwich : meet Burroughs : dine at North’s , w. Currans & Grahams; adv. Dr Glennie
: Mul. sups. Dawes & Jo G call n .

5. M.
Catalogue, w. M J .

6. Tu.
Mrs Taylor & C Mountcashel call: W C Brown calls n :
theatre, w. M J; Percy
Catalogue.

7. W.
Catalogue, w. M J . Call on Davison
&
Curran
n : T T sups.

8. Th. Call on Davison
,
Topping
, &
G M C
&
Lepard
: Fargues & Curran n call. trs
9. F. Preface to Catalogue. Mrs Taylor calls: sup at Lamb’s , w. M J .

10. Sa. Write to Wedgwood . Satchel & Taylor call: call on Lamb
: T T & Mulready sup.

11. Su. Call on C Mountcashel
: do, Curran
, Wroughton & John Flather call n : T T dines. M M & M J at Brille .

12. M.
C Mountcashel calls: call on Jo G , w. W : Currans, Wolcot, Boaden, Tuthil, Hazlit & T T dine; invités Perry, Northcote & Davison
.

13. Tu. Call on Wroughton
: Mulready & T T sup.

14. W. Call on Davison
,
Curran
n &
Northcote
: T T sups: Hoare calls n .

15. Th.
C Mountcashel dines: call on Lamb
.

16. F.
Catalogue, w. T T, fin.
17. Sa. Dine at Perry’s , w. Currans, Popes, Spanky, Campbel, Macdonnel & Finnerty: sleep.

Oct. 18. Su. Call on Mountcashel (w. Curran) &
Keir , w. M J, &c:
G M C dines.

19. M. Call on Jacob
: C Mountcashel dines: Mulready sups. Duplicate to Wedgwood : write to Rolfe .

20. Tu.
Wilson, supercargo, calls: call on Longdil
: theatre, All in Wrong; adv. O’Brien, Curran, mrs Plunket (& Warings) : T T & Mulready sup.

21. W.
C Mountcashel dines: call on Curran
(adv. Rd ) , &, w. him, on O’ Brien
: theatre, 1/6 Rosetta; adv. O Brien
: Mulready sups.

22. Th.
C Mountcashel dines: call on M Jones
&
R Taylor
: Mulready & R Smirke, junr , call.

23. F.
C Mountcashel calls: call on Rogers
&
Glaister
: dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli & Bonnycastle; adv. Hawlet
.

24. Sa. Write to Sheridan . Stamp-Office : call on Taylor
: Mulready sups; adv. Summons
.
Oct. 25. Su. Write to Johnson . Curran calls, talk of C M : T T dines.
26. M. Write to Wedgwood . Rolfe calls. Spenser, Ecl. 1, 2, 3.

27. Tu. Spenser, Ecl. 4, 5, 6. M Jones dines:
theatre, w. do , T T & M J, Time’s a Tell-Tale .

28. W. Call on Rogers
&
Lamb
: R Taylor at tea: theatre, Epilogue. meet Jacob at Annuity .

29. Th. Call on Fargues
&
Clark
, &
Montague, surveyor
: theatre, 1/2 Isabella, & Too Friendly by Half. Walsh calls n , & Hodgkins n .

30. F. Call on Nicholson
, &
Clennel
, &
Longdil
: Walsh & T T call.

31. Sa.
Ed. Wt calls na : T T, from T R D L , sups, seeking Sheridan
.

Nov. 1. Su. Call on Wroughton
: T T dines; adv. N G & G M C
.

2. M.
Walsh calls, & Fk : call on Nicholson
, &
Whitworth, draper
.

3. Tu. Call on Whitworth
,
Bolton
,
Pickering
,
Kerslake
&
Gell
, &
Nicholson
: Walsh calls. Theatre, 2/5 HeartsAche.

4. W. Call on Sutton
&
Nicholson
&
Montague
n : (meet Pilcher, w. M J.)

5. Th. Call on Taylor
,
Philips
n &
Alexander
: meet Longdil :
theatre, w. T T, Narbonne .

6. F. Disappointment, Elliston : dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Hewlet, Mulready & Evans; adv. Kinnaird
.

7. Sa. Call on Philips
(adv. Taylor) ,
Johnson
&
H Rogers
: G M C dines:
theatre, w. M J, Tim [ ] meet Lamb .

Nov. 8. Su. Call on Mulready
: Fk & W C Brown dine; adv. E F, junr
.

9. M. Dine at Guildhall; adv. Sheridan, Philips, Sharp, Boddington, Knapp, Dignum, Tookes, Solly & Goodbehere
. Deliquium.

10. Tu.
Elliston calls, read : Lambs sup.

11. W. Dine at Lamb’s ; adv. Hazlit & Philips
: theatre, Winter’s Tale, acts 1, 2, 3.

12. Th. Call on Dawe
&
Wroughton
: T T sups; adv. Mulready
.
13. F. Remove from Somers Town . Mulready calls. Deliquium.
14. Sa. Deliquia 3a . Write to H Siddons & mrs Powel .

Nov. 15. Su. Deliquia. T T sups; adv. Mulready
. H Siddons calls n .

16. M.
Carlisle , Buchan & mrs Topping call: call on M Lamb
: T T sups.

17. Tu. Call on H Siddons
,
Alexander
n &
Hazlit
: theatre, Two Faces; adv. Falkland, Philips & Perrys
.

18. W. Call on mrs H Siddons
n &
Johnson
: Jo G calls, & Buchan n .

19. Th. Call on Alexander
n : T T sups: call on
Hazlit
.

20. F.
M Lamb & Alexander call: dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Knowles, Brown & Carl .

21. Sa.
Lamb calls: call on
Johnson
,
Topping
&
G M C
:
theatre, w. M J, 3/10 Hoyden, & Ella Rosenberg .

Nov. 22. Su. Call on Wroughton
: T T dines.

23. M. Camilla, 1 page. Buckingham calls; adv. T T
.

24. Tu.
Lamb & Mulready call. Write to Elliston .

25. W. Call on Toppings
&
G M C
n : M Jones dines.
26. Th. Write to Wroughton .

27. F. Call on Nicholson ; adv. Walsh
: theatre, Jane Shore; adv. O Brien
.

28. Sa. Call on T T
&
Lamb
: Alexander & Mulready call, & Hazlit .

Nov. 29. Su. Call on Wroughton
: T T dines. Royal Family of Portugal for Brazil
.

30. M.
Alexander calls: call on Montagu, surveyor
: Mulready sups: Walsh calls.

Dec. 1. Tu. Call on Sloper (adv. Walsh ),
Wroughton
&
R Taylor
: T T dines: theatre, Provoked Husband, & Blind Boy.

2. W.
Mrs Powel , Dawe na & Clennel call: call on Sloper
,
Dennet
,
Wright
,
Daponte
,
Oriel
, &
Johnson ; adv. maj. Moore
: meet W C Brown : T T dines: miss Atkins calls, F Buildings .

3. Th. Call on mrs H Siddons (read),
Pickering
,
Daponte
&
Dennet
: & dis-appointment, Elliston : Clennel sups: meet Wood .

4. F. Dis-appointment, Elliston : call on Wright
,
Dennet
,
Swannack
,
Pickering
(adv. Bolton) ,
Sloper
&
West
: sup at Lamb’s , w. M J . Call on Johnson
,
Davison
,
Goodbehere
&
R Taylor
.

5. Sa. Call on Oriel
,
Elliston
n ,
Dennet
,
Swannack
,
Pickering
,
West
, &
Carlisle (for M J ): meet Sloper . (Nicholson enlarged.)

Dec. 6. Su. Epilogue, vs. 39. Call on Wroughton
: T T & Clennel sup.

7. M. Call on Clennel
,
M Lamb
,
Nicholson
,
Lb
,
Smirke
n &
Jo G
n : M Jones call: T T sups; adv. M Lamb
.

8. Tu.
Elliston calls: T T at tea: sup at
Hazlit’s , w. Lambs, Stodart & Hume . Finish Epilogue: M J from Wolcot .

9. W. Call on Oriel
,
Dennet
&
Nicholson
: theatre, Henry VIII; adv. Paul (Heywood & Macdonald) : M J from Wolcot : T T sups. Alexander calls.

10. Th. Call on H Siddons
n : dine at Topping’s ; adv. T T
. Write to P H G & Moody .

11. F. Write to Perry & Alexander : Lamb & Clennel call: call on J Taylor
.

12. Sa. Call on Davison
n ,
Oriel
,
Nicholson
,
Dennet
,
H Siddons
&
Wroughton
n : Clennel sups.

Dec. 13. Su.
M Jones calls: call on Wroughton
.

14. M. Call on Davison
&
R Taylor
: Clennel calls: Flathers at tea: tea
Philips’s , w. Wolcot, Busby, Reid, Brown, Batty, Tim. Brown, Sheriff Smith, Brancomb, Dixon & Cooke .
15. Tu. Rehearsal: Dawe & T T at tea (explanation : T T & Mulready sup.
16. W. Rehearsal (adv. T T) : T T dines: theatre, Faulkener; adv. Mulready, Raymond, &c : Green Room .

17. Th.
Rise at five; write 2 pp . Call on Wroughton
: theatre, alterations (adv. T T) : M Lamb , R Taylor , Mulready & Nicholson call: Mulready
theatre, w. T T, F, C & M
: T T & Brown sup; adv. R Taylor
.
Graham at D L .

18. F. Call on Philips
,
R Taylor
, &
Johnson
(adv. Bonnycastle & Knowles) : theatre; adv. Graham & Wroughton
. Carlisles call.

19. Sa.
C & M Lamb call: Clennel sups.
Dec. 20. Su. Proofs. Faulkener. Mulready sups.

21. M. Advertisement, Shopman; Bradley, &c: E Fks, 2 Dawes, 2 Mulreadys & T T dine: S H Wilcocke calls: call on Wroughton
&
Grahm, T R D L .

22. Tu. Call on Nicholson
,
mrs Dennet
&
Rodwel
: S H Wilcocke breakfasts.

23. W.
Preparations for subscribing . call on Toppings
&
G M C
.

24. Th.
Toppings & T T dine.
25. F. Accounts. Write to Philips & Smirke .

26. Sa. Call on Smirke
&
Nicholson
na : Clennels call: //
T T sups from Peake
.
Dec. 27. Su. Raynal, Bresil, çala. Call on Philips twice n .
28. M. Raynal, Bresil, çala.

29. Tu. Vertot, Portugal, p. 56. Clennels , Carlisles & Dawe call: call on
Philips twice n; adv. Mavor
.

30. W.
Davis, from sir F B, calls:
Philips’s , tea & supper; adv. Leigh & Surr
. Old Daniel published

31. Th. Write to Curran . Alexander & T T call: Mulready au soir; adv. Summons
.
